org.shared.image.kernel

Interface ImageKernel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaImageKernel, ModalImageKernel, NativeImageKernel

    public interface ImageKernel
extends Service
    A provider of image processing operations.

                       int[] srcS,
                       double[] dstV,
                       int[] dstD,
                       int[] dstS)
        Creates an integral image.
        Parameters:
        srcV - the source values.
        srcD - the source dimensions.
        srcS - the source strides.
        dstV - the destination values.
        dstD - the destination dimensions.
        dstS - the destination strides.
